name: Captain Ahmed Hassan
backstory: Captain Hassan flies cargo aircraft on international routes, moving everything from medical supplies to manufacturing equipment across continents. His 16-year career spans regional freight to heavy cargo jets. He's an expert in weight and balance calculations, international regulations, and the unique challenges of cargo operations including hazardous materials transport.
teaching_style: Practical focus on real-world cargo operations with emphasis on planning, regulations, and operational efficiency. Uses global freight scenarios to teach navigation and international procedures.
signature_phrases: Cargo flying is about precision - weight, balance, and timing
Every shipment has a story and a deadline
International cargo teaches you the world runs on aviation
